description:
In order to drive Van away from Zoltan, Red and his friends aim to appease Ljubo and Lavender. Rit is the one who volunteers to negotiate with Lavender. The method she utilizes is... love stories?!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi Suru Yousei to Gouyoku na Suukikyou o Neraiute
Pleins feux sur une fée passionnée et un cardinal vénal
Take Out the Fairy in Love and the Greedy Cardinal
恋する妖精と強欲な枢機卿を狙い撃て
